channel.title: Home on evoke 365
channel.description: Recent content in Home on evoke 365

item.title: Showcase
item.description: It takes 2 steps to remember everything: Step 1 - take notes It takes a few seconds to note down something in your evoke 365 such as vocabularies, phrases, concepts etc. Anything you want to remember. Step 2 - get reminded After your note are added to evoke 365, a revision schedule will be created. Your notes will be sent to your email inbox just before you are about to forget them.
